articles.title: Sunday Schedule
articles.content: House of Grace holds two Sunday services. Service 1: 9:00 AM. Service 2: 11:00 AM. Both are held at the main HGF venue. Worship begins 15 minutes before the service start time.

articles.title: Midweek Prayer
articles.content: Wednesday evening prayer meeting at 7:00 PM. Open to all members and visitors.

articles.title: What is a Cell Group?
articles.content: Cell groups are small gatherings of 8-15 members that meet weekly for Bible study, prayer, and fellowship. They are the backbone of the HGF community.

articles.title: Joining a Cell Group
articles.content: New members are encouraged to join a cell group within their first month. Contact the church office or your assigned coordinator to find a group near you.

articles.title: Available Ministries
articles.content: HGF has the following active ministries: Worship Team, Kids Ministry (KIDS Church), Youth Ministry, Media Ministry, Ushering Ministry, Prayer Ministry, Cell Group Ministry, and Outreach Ministry.

articles.title: Joining a Ministry
articles.content: To join a ministry, attend the ministry orientation held monthly. Express your interest to the ministry leader or at the church office.

articles.title: Event Schedule
articles.content: HGF hosts regular events including Praise Nights, Prayer Summits, Leadership Training, and Community Outreach. Check the Events section in HGF Connect for the latest schedule.

articles.title: RSVP for Events
articles.content: You can RSVP for events through the HGF Connect app. Some events require pre-registration due to limited space.

articles.title: Membership Process
articles.content: To become an official HGF member: (1) Attend regularly for at least 1 month, (2) Complete the membership form at the office or via HGF Connect, (3) Attend the New Member Orientation, (4) Get connected to a cell group and ministry.

articles.title: Baptism
articles.content: Water baptism by immersion is offered periodically. Contact the church office or your cell group leader to express your interest in being baptized.

articles.title: How to Give
articles.content: Tithes and offerings can be given during Sunday services in the offering envelopes. Online giving options are available â€” contact the church office for bank details.

articles.title: Church Contact
articles.content: House of Grace Fellowship. You can reach us through the HGF Connect app, or visit us during Sunday services. For urgent matters, contact your cell group leader.
